Uses of Interface
pythagoras.i.IPoint

Packages that use IPoint
pythagoras.i The Pythagoras geometry utility classes specialized on int.

Constructors in pythagoras.i with parameters of type IPoint

          Constructs a point with coordinates equal to the supplied point.

          Constructs a rectangle with upper-left corner at the supplied point and with the supplied dimensions.
